instructions:
Call Summarization 2

For this test, you will need to listen to information that is provided to you through the computer. We recommend using a headset or a set of quality speakers. You may write notes about each of the stories in the box in the lower half of the screen labeled Notes to help you recall information about the story.

After each story has been told, follow the on-screen instructions to proceed to a question where you will be asked to choose the alternative that best summarizes that story.

The information you record in any of the boxes on the screen will later be available to assist you in choosing the correct answer.

HOW TO RESPOND TO MULTIPLE-CHOICE QUESTION

With each question there will be four choices labeled A, B, C, and D. You can choose your response in one of three ways.

  1. You can use your mouse to select your answers
  2. You can use the up and down arrows to choose your response.
  3. You can hold down the Alt key and then press either A, B, C, or D.

mcqQuestions.questionText: According to the caller, there was/were_________ men who came into the store to buy beer?
The party that the men asked the caller to go to with them was said to be:

options.text: in progress at the time the men were in the market

mcqQuestions.questionText: The caller reported that there was damage to:
According to the caller, the party where the suspects will be is located on Kingston:
The car mentioned in this scenario is described as being ________ in color.

emergencyQuestions.questionText: A street gang is running after a man to beat him up.

mcqQuestions.questionText: The location of where the suspicious vehicle is located is:
According to this caller, the suspicious vehicle is:

options.text: Parked in an unknown direction in the driveway.
Parked on the street in front of the house.
Backed up to the front door of the house.

mcqQuestions.questionText: According to this caller, the suspicious vehicle has been at the location he indicated for approximately:
According to this caller, what kinds of items were being loaded into the vehicle?

options.text: The specific types of items were NOT identified

mcqQuestions.questionText: Based upon the information received, what is the most detailed accurate description of the suspicious vehicle?

emergencyQuestions.questionText: Man falls off his motorcyle and cut his head.

mcqQuestions.questionText: According to this caller, the accident occurred:
According to this caller, the accident occurred near:
According to this caller, the female passenger in the rear seat of the car is:
According to this caller, the accident occurred when the car:

options.text: The caller did not specify what happened during the accident.

mcqQuestions.questionText: The age of the female passenger in the front seat was described as being:

options.text: The caller did not specify an age for this passenger.

captions.CS111:
WEBVTT

1
00:00:00.150 --> 00:00:02.194
Hi. My name is Samantha black.

2
00:00:02.550 --> 00:00:08.645
Samantha as S A M A N T H A
Black

5
00:00:08.910 --> 00:00:11.300
B L A C K.

6
00:00:11.880 --> 00:00:13.610
You know like the color black.

7
00:00:14.070 --> 00:00:18.270
I work at the market on 1 2 7 7 0

9
00:00:18.930 --> 00:00:21.089
0 A K in

10
00:00:21.090 --> 00:00:26.720
North Vale N O R T H V A L E.

13
00:00:27.420 --> 00:00:28.460
I'm scared.

14
00:00:28.740 --> 00:00:30.650
I only worked here for two days.

15
00:00:30.960 --> 00:00:32.130
I tried to call the owner

16
00:00:32.131 --> 00:00:34.109
but there's no answer because I
forgot he's

17
00:00:34.110 --> 00:00:35.150
on vacation.

18
00:00:35.700 --> 00:00:37.430
There were two guys here you know.

19
00:00:37.710 --> 00:00:39.230
They came by to buy beer.

20
00:00:39.630 --> 00:00:41.240
Boy, they were drunk you know

21
00:00:41.550 --> 00:00:42.750
one guy paid for the beer

22
00:00:42.751 --> 00:00:44.090
with a personal check.

23
00:00:44.460 --> 00:00:46.410
I told my boss that I couldn't take

24
00:00:46.411 --> 00:00:48.390
checks that they got so mad

25
00:00:48.391 --> 00:00:49.360
I took the check.

26
00:00:49.830 --> 00:00:51.720
I took down the guy's driver's
license

27
00:00:51.721 --> 00:00:53.390
number and wrote it on the check.

28
00:00:53.910 --> 00:00:59.690
It is E 8 7 4 6 3 5 2.

31
00:01:00.180 --> 00:01:01.380
They even asked me to go

32
00:01:01.381 --> 00:01:03.360
with them to a big party on Kingston

33
00:01:03.361 --> 00:01:05.580
court that was going to start at 10
o'clock.

34
00:01:05.730 --> 00:01:07.320
That is supposed to have a live band

35
00:01:07.321 --> 00:01:08.150
and everything.

36
00:01:08.570 --> 00:01:10.470
Look, they just left when

37
00:01:10.471 --> 00:01:12.420
they were leaving they back their
dirty pickup

38
00:01:12.421 --> 00:01:14.430
truck into a dark blue car in the
parking

39
00:01:14.431 --> 00:01:14.900
lot.

40
00:01:15.300 --> 00:01:17.490
The crash practically tore the
truck's bumper

41
00:01:17.491 --> 00:01:19.599
off the truck's license plate

42
00:01:19.600 --> 00:01:23.960
is 2 U E S 7 3 9

44
00:01:24.300 --> 00:01:26.490
and boy is that vehicle really noisy

45
00:01:26.491 --> 00:01:28.730
from the bumper rubbing up against
the tire.

46
00:01:29.040 --> 00:01:30.050
Please help me.

47
00:01:30.240 --> 00:01:32.070
I'm afraid I'll get in trouble for
selling

48
00:01:32.071 --> 00:01:33.800
them the beer and taking the check.

49
00:01:33.990 --> 00:01:34.725
What should I do?
captions.CS112:
WEBVTT

1
00:00:00.150 --> 00:00:02.199
Hi. This is Larry Park again

2
00:00:02.200 --> 00:00:04.400
L A R R Y P A R K. 

3
00:00:04.401 --> 00:00:06.390
I know you guys are getting tired
of hearing

4
00:00:06.391 --> 00:00:07.010
from me.

5
00:00:07.200 --> 00:00:09.200
My wife says I should mind my own
business.

6
00:00:09.870 --> 00:00:19.470
I live at 2 7 5 2 Elder E L D E R in
Valley Green V A L L E Y G R E E N.

11
00:00:20.040 --> 00:00:22.460
My neighbors across the street are
on vacation.

12
00:00:22.800 --> 00:00:23.880
I saw them leave Tuesday

13
00:00:23.881 --> 00:00:25.719
with suitcases should

14
00:00:25.720 --> 00:00:26.770
be no one home.

15
00:00:27.380 --> 00:00:29.480
There's this vehicle a suspicious

16
00:00:29.481 --> 00:00:31.370
vehicle backed up to the garage in

17
00:00:31.371 --> 00:00:32.260
their driveway.

18
00:00:32.600 --> 00:00:34.570
Two guys are loading stuff into a
van.

19
00:00:35.000 --> 00:00:36.950
I know it's not my neighbors vehicle
since

20
00:00:36.951 --> 00:00:38.590
they drive a blue Chevy van

21
00:00:39.290 --> 00:00:41.150
Well yeah. You already have my phone

22
00:00:41.151 --> 00:00:45.660
number but here it is again 9 2 9 7 6 7 0.

25
00:00:46.100 --> 00:00:47.770
I know last time I called you

26
00:00:48.190 --> 00:00:49.670
you guys said it was unfounded

27
00:00:49.671 --> 00:00:50.350
or something.

28
00:00:50.780 --> 00:00:52.640
That time someone was feeding my
next door

29
00:00:52.641 --> 00:00:53.620
neighbor's dogs.

30
00:00:53.990 --> 00:00:55.909
My wife said I should mind my own
business.

31
00:00:55.910 --> 00:00:56.890
Oh never mind.

32
00:00:57.170 --> 00:00:58.300
It's probably nothing.

33
00:00:58.520 --> 00:01:00.350
It's just that I know that dirty
brown van

34
00:01:00.351 --> 00:01:01.780
doesn't belong in this neighborhood.

35
00:01:02.270 --> 00:01:04.420
Since they have been there for about
90 minutes

36
00:01:04.670 --> 00:01:05.450
I had time to go over

37
00:01:05.451 --> 00:01:07.700
and copy down part of the vehicle
identification

38
00:01:07.701 --> 00:01:09.620
number of the van in case they are
robbing the place

39
00:01:09.621 --> 00:01:10.270
or something.

40
00:01:10.550 --> 00:01:20.466
The VIN number is 1 R N T A P 6 4 D L J 3 3 4 5 P.

45
00:01:21.380 --> 00:01:23.360
Maybe you could check out my
neighbor's house when you

46
00:01:23.361 --> 00:01:24.050
are in the area.
captions.CS113:
WEBVTT

1
00:00:00.240 --> 00:00:02.240
My name is Esther Lopez.

2
00:00:02.310 --> 00:00:06.929
Esther E S T H E R Lopez

4
00:00:06.930 --> 00:00:08.572
L O P E Z.

5
00:00:09.810 --> 00:00:11.690
I live in the town of DarlEY

6
00:00:11.850 --> 00:00:17.900
D A R L E Y at 2 3 4 2 1

9
00:00:18.060 --> 00:00:23.060
Webster W E B S T E R.

12
00:00:23.700 --> 00:00:25.790
Have you had any reports of an
accident?

13
00:00:26.430 --> 00:00:27.869
I don't want to be a busybody

14
00:00:27.870 --> 00:00:30.000
but I think it's important for
people to become

15
00:00:30.001 --> 00:00:30.830
involved.

16
00:00:31.500 --> 00:00:33.329
I was at the Market on Main Street

17
00:00:33.330 --> 00:00:35.420
loading my groceries into my car.

18
00:00:35.490 --> 00:00:37.290
You know the one on Main Street

19
00:00:37.291 --> 00:00:39.260
and not the market on Stewart
Street.

20
00:00:39.630 --> 00:00:41.820
Anyway I saw this accident happened

21
00:00:41.821 --> 00:00:43.010
right in front of me.

22
00:00:43.290 --> 00:00:45.120
I waited for ten minutes for someone

23
00:00:45.121 --> 00:00:46.949
to show up to help them that

24
00:00:46.950 --> 00:00:48.089
nobody has.

25
00:00:48.090 --> 00:00:49.520
So now I'm calling

26
00:00:50.010 --> 00:00:51.900
the driver of the car has a small
cut

27
00:00:51.901 --> 00:00:53.760
on his forehead from where it hit

28
00:00:53.761 --> 00:00:54.760
the windshield

29
00:00:54.780 --> 00:00:56.790
but I don't think he is all there if
you know

30
00:00:56.791 --> 00:00:57.620
what I mean.

31
00:00:57.930 --> 00:00:59.250
I mean he looks pretty dazed

32
00:00:59.251 --> 00:01:01.100
and he keeps talking to himself

33
00:01:01.350 --> 00:01:03.240
but his little girl isn't looking
too good

34
00:01:03.241 --> 00:01:04.040
at all.

35
00:01:04.349 --> 00:01:06.470
I think she may be hurt pretty
badly.

36
00:01:06.900 --> 00:01:08.399
There she is bleeding

37
00:01:08.400 --> 00:01:10.380
and all huddled up in a pile of
empty

38
00:01:10.381 --> 00:01:12.530
beer cans in the front seat of the
car.

39
00:01:13.050 --> 00:01:14.960
Actually she isn't that little

40
00:01:15.120 --> 00:01:17.260
probably about 15 years old

41
00:01:17.670 --> 00:01:19.679
and I think the lady in the back
seat must've

42
00:01:19.680 --> 00:01:21.570
passed out because she isn't moving

43
00:01:21.571 --> 00:01:22.070
at all.

44
00:01:22.770 --> 00:01:24.980
By the way the car's license plate
was

45
00:01:25.020 --> 00:01:29.170
4 6 2 U T D. I Saw the

47
00:01:29.171 --> 00:01:31.270
whole thing and no one was wearing a
seatbelt

48
00:01:31.271 --> 00:01:32.840
when they hit the telephone pole.

49
00:01:33.480 --> 00:01:35.309
Let me tell you I don't think they
should let

50
00:01:35.310 --> 00:01:37.170
anyone under the age of ten ride in

51
00:01:37.171 --> 00:01:38.890
a car without a seatbelt on.

52
00:01:39.480 --> 00:01:41.430
There are lots of damn negligent
people

53
00:01:41.431 --> 00:01:41.970
out there.

54
00:01:42.790 --> 00:01:44.089
I know you already have this

55
00:01:44.090 --> 00:01:48.100
but my telephone number is 8 2 9 7 3 4 1.

57
00:01:48.101 --> 00:01:49.870
I guess you better send

58
00:01:49.871 --> 00:01:51.760
an ambulance out before the guy
tried to

59
00:01:51.761 --> 00:01:52.960
drive away or something.
